title: Research data quality: Bash-input, Grep-input, Glob-input
description: Analyze samples of Bash-input, Grep-input, Glob-input. For each type: extract samples, score relevance, recommend handling strategy.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Paper 1 (Bash-input): Extract 5+ samples of 'Bash-input' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 1 (Bash-input): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
Paper 2 (Grep-input): Extract 5+ samples of 'Grep-input' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 2 (Grep-input): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
Paper 3 (Glob-input): Extract 5+ samples of 'Glob-input' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 3 (Glob-input): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
